bioAsHtml:
Dr. Fabian St채ber is software developer, research and development lead, consultant, architect, at ConSol* Consulting & Solutions Software GmbH in Munich, Germany.

Fabian is excited about JEE, clustered back-ends, Big Data applications, and advanced distributed architectures. He is also member of the JSR 373 expert group. His academic research was on decentralized, peer-to-peer-based network architecture.
